page.title: 13TRANSPORT/TRADE
page.content: ALONG IT TO GET OUT OF WALTHAMSTOW THIS THEN CAUSES A LOT OF TRAFFIC JAMS. WITHIN OUR AREA WE HAVE{TWO {BRITISH RAIL STATIONS}AND{ONE TUBE {STATIONS.}THE PRIMARY LAND COVER FOR OUR AREA IS{RESIDENTIAL}MAINLY BEING {VICTORIAN OR EDWARDIAN}TERRACES-ANY NEW HOUSING IS BLOCKS OF FLATS. THERE ARE A LARGE AMOUNT OF COMMERCIAL PREMISES IN OUR AREA AS IT HAS THE {WALTHAMSTOW HIGH STREET}AND ANOTHER IMPORTANT STREET -{HOE ST.}A NEW SHOPPING COMPLEX IS BEING CONSTRUCTED AT THE TOP END OF THE HIGH ST. THIS IS REPLACING A LOT OF SHUT DOWN SHOPS IN THE AREA. THE{MARKET}IN THE HIGH ST. IS WELL KNOWN AND HAS BEEN GOING FOR A LONG TIME.{IT IS THE LONGEST MARKET IN {BRITAIN}AND IS A GOOD MARKET BECAUSE YOU CAN BUY ANYTHING THERE.
